content:
/>
IX.iii.1.J.5.h
.
Definition:  Covered Asset Amount
The
covered asset amount
is the monetary value by which a claimant’s net worth would have exceeded the limit due to covered asset(s) alone if the uncompensated value of the covered asset(s) had been included in net worth.
Reference
:  For more information on the covered asset amount, see
38 CFR 3.276(a)(3)
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section J - Net Worth, Asset Transfers, and Penalty Periods
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section J
